item.sourceblock.empty_source_block.tool: Voids fluids, gases (requires Mekanism), and energy
sourceblock.info.mekanism_not_loaded: Mekanism not detected, gas handling disabled
jei.sourceblock.milk_source_block.info: To obtain: Right-click a cow with an Empty Source Block in hand. The cow will be consumed in the process.
jei.sourceblock.water_source_block.info: Can be crafted with an Empty Source Block and a Water Bucket. Alternatively, right-click a placed Empty Source Block with a Water Bucket to fill it.
jei.sourceblock.lava_source_block.info: Can be crafted with an Empty Source Block and a Lava Bucket. Alternatively, right-click a placed Empty Source Block with a Lava Bucket to fill it.
